title: Nice vintage shades
body: These glasses are comfy and easy to wear, cute vintage look and half the price of my other sunglasses.. and they are polarized!

title: Definitely NOT polarized
body: Super cute and good value. But it says multiple places that these are polarized and they definitely are NOT. It’ comes with a little test image for for polarized and it doesn’t work. The image didn’t show up.

title: BUY THESE
body: Do yourself a favor and just buy these. These are solid vintage style glasses. The lens tint is perfect for those brighter cloudy days or going out!

title: Cute but small
body: The virtual try on makes the glasses seem bigger than they are. These are small.

title: Good quality glasses
body: I loved these! They delivered super quick and they fit my face so well, definitely my favorite glasses.

title: Super cute!
body: Love the retro look! These are light weight and comfortable. The price could go down a bit, but I've already ordered my second pair lol after receiving the first. Hard not to love these!

title: These look good
body: I am happy with this purchase. I got a compliment the first time I wore them.

title: Maybe a little too lightweight
body: They are very lightweight, but also very comfortable to wear. They are dark enough, that's for sure. For $15 you can't go wrong. I hope they last a while.

title: Must buy
body: As a chronic sunglass breaker these have been a lifesaver not only because of the price but also since they are so sturdy.

title: Fun glasses, great selection @ a great price$!!!
body: So lightweight, so NOT cheap looking & if you misplace & lose but can’t leave home w/out your glasses like me, then do what I’m about to do & stock up!!!! I love these! Thank you!

title: Jeffry Dahmer vibes
body: these look really cute on everyone else but when I put them on me, I literally look like Jeffrey Dahmer maybe I already looked like him anyways, I’m not really sure, but I don’t feel like I look as cute as all these other people lol!

title: Cute for summer
body: Wish the frame was alittle bigger but overall cute and comfortable. Plastic but still looks of good quality

title: These are worth the money!
body: Want expensive looking sunnies for half the price? These are it!!!! I am in love with these!

title: Fabulous find
body: These aviators are fantastic. Great for $15. Will purchase more.

title: Very cute
body: I really like these sunglasses they are very cute and flattering. I normally don't look good in aviators but with their larger size these work! Nice color and feel sturdy. They are polarized and work well.

title: Favorite!
body: I love these sunglasses! So cute and people always ask where I got them.

title: Super stylish
body: I don’t typically go for this style of frames but I am pleasantly surprised with how cute they are. The lenses are not all that dark, so you can still see someone’s eyes through them although that’s not a dealbreaker. Definitely keeping these and I’m excited to branch out a little more in my sunglass style.

title: I wear these almost daily
body: I got these as just a lighter pair of sunglasses. The light shade of the lenses made these pretty comfortable to wear inside as safety glasses though, so they’ve gotten a lot more use than I expected. I’ve legit had parts hit these glasses and they held up fine. I wish there was a way to get them with wings on the side to help prevent ingress, but overall I’ve been happily impressed considering the low price

title: So cute!!!
body: I recently had Quay sunglasses and they broke, so I came on here looking for some more affordable sunglasses that gets the job done while also looking stylish. These are perfect!!

title: perfect sunglasses
body: i love these so much. they are light and stylish. would get them again in the future.

title: Me encantaron! Los volvería a comprar
body: Es una buena inversión, los volvería a comprar

title: Love it
body: Exactly what I wanted

title: So cute and high quality!!
body: Love these. Only con is that you can kinda see the rim of the glasses in your peripheral vision. Weirded me out at first but eventually my eyes tuned it out.

title: super cute
body: very cute only issue is when you look your phone scream it looks rainbow but besides that worth it

title: Stylist sunglasses
body: Very satisfied with the Retro sunglasses.

title: Se rayó todo el cristal con mucha facilidad
body: Se rayó el crystal con mucha facilidad

title: perfect
body: perfect

title: Love it
body: Perfecttt

title: Love these
body: Always get so many compliments and they are such a good price, somewhat polarized though

title: Perfect!
body: These are really nice and protect you from the harmful rays of the sun. They block out enough of the sun your eyes won’t hurt at all but there light enough to not feel like your wearing really dark sunglasses. There awesome.

title: Good price
body: Good sunglasses for the price

title: Cute!
body: Love these! Super cute and affordable!

title: Love these!
body: For inexpensive glasses these are well made and super cute I’ve bought like 4 different ones already! I get compliments on them - get them you won’t be sorry!

title: great glasses
body: They came in quicker than expected, they look great, and they have lasted a long time.

title: Great look and quality. Ordering more colors.
body: Love the color gradient and sturdy material.

title: Buenas
body: Muy buena relación precio calidad

title: Love
body: Love these sunglasses. They are similar to ray bans it way better price. Fit great, look great and awesome purchase

title: A little small
body: I have a round face and thought these looked big which I like. They are fine and I might wear them occasionally when I can’t find my other glasses, but they are narrow if you have a rounder shaped face. I don’t love them, but don’t hate them.

title: perfect
body: not too dark and not too light

title: A must!!
body: It’s hard to buy glasses for moms over 40 but these glasses are a must!! They fit perfectly, they durable, and fit my face perfectly!

title: Highly recommend
body: Nice, light weight and definitely an eye catcher! I’ll be ordering more soon!

title: New favorite
body: I absolutely love these! I like the look of aviators, but hate wearing them because when I rest them on top of my head my hair always gets stuck in the nose pads…..ouch! I bought these and will be ordering them in black. Unfortunately black is the only other color they offer that I like or need

title: I absolutely love these sunnies
body: Sooo cute, durable, lightweight…. I’ve gotten so many compliments

title: Disappointed with the color I expected
body: I supposedly bought the blue ones but nothing to do with the blue color, they are very comfortable and light I liked them but the truth was that I was very disappointed in the color because I expected the color in the photo, they are not even blue

title: Love these retro glasses!!!!!
body: Great quality sunglasses! Super versatile, I got so many compliments in these.

title: Great sunglasses!
body: These feel very high quality and are very stylish, exactly what I expected!

title: Cute but deceptive
body: These are photographed at an angle that is a bit deceiving. I ended up sending them back as they were oversized aviators. Comfortable when I tried them out, just not for my face.

title: Buy them
body: I LOVE these sunglasses. They are so cute and feel like great quality. They came with a cleaning cloth too!

title: The Look For Less
body: Bought 3 pairs of these on a whim. One pair for an office gift exchange, my wife will get a pair this holiday season and I treated myself to the yellow lensed model.This aviator-esque frame is timeless and a staple for anyone. So many color combos to choose from. Feel, look & packaged like more expensive sunnies.

title: Perfect
body: Perfect

title: Great pair of sunglasses
body: I love these sunglasses great to wear outside

title: They are nice
body: They fit fine and are exactly what they are advertised as. Would pay more for these in metal frames though

title: Amazing
body: Sooo pleasantly surprised by the quality of these! I absolutely love them

title: Cute!
body: I saw this in a influence in TikTok they seems nice!! But having them in my hands doesn’t seems the same but they are cute

title: Love them
body: Love these!! I gave it a 4 star ONLY because they are very flimsy and feel like they will snap in half if your not careful but other then that, I love them!

title: Narrow fit
body: Really cute pair but has a narrow fit around the head. Looks oversized but the arms are narrow and cause me headaches if worn for too long. If you have a small head they would work, haha!

title: Wife loves them
body: Bought them as a Christmas gift for my wife. She loves them. Great fit and look great.

title: Super super cute
body: Cake exactly as pictured. Oversized bug just what I wanted

title: MY FAVORITE.
body: I love these glasses! They’re unique, flattering, and great quality. My favorite is wearing them with a monochrome outfit for a pop of color. They look best when wearing something black IMO. Buy them.

title: Exactly what I was hoping for
body: These are exactly the look I was hoping for. Only complaint is the polarization makes it hard to look at certain screens

title: Great for the price
body: I always lose sunglasses so I don’t like to spend a ton on them. These are so cute and the price is right!

title: Love
body: Love these so much! I keep reordering every time I loose them!

title: The Top Bar Hits My Forehead
body: There are two bars attaching the sunglasses together: the one on the bridge of your nose and the second one on top. That second one hits my forehead/eyebrows. I don't think that that's supposed to happen and it's weirdly uncomfortable

title: Cute and comfy
body: These are great quality for the price. I get migraines and need polarized and these work just fine.

title: Light and comfortable
body: I like the retro look of these and the soft pink frame. They’re pretty big but light and a little plasticy, (I never buy expensive glasses). Overall quality is decent for the price. I ordered to wear at the beach and felt like I got good, comfortable coverage.

title: Hermosas gafas de sol
body: Esta hermosa! Super cómoda y lo más importante a pesar q se ve fashion y chic , protege del sol al 100 por ciento

title: Great!
body: Buy them!

title: Good investment
body: I always get a ton of compliments on these glasses. They don't look too cheap and can be worn with just about anything

title: Large lightweight, and so cute I bought a second pair
body: The title says it all. I really love these! It’s so hard to find lightweight sunglasses, and if you do they usually have to be tiny. I don’t like things on my face, but I absolutely love these! I also bought them in black for really sunny days since I am pretty light sensitive, but this color is excellent for overcast days, mornings and late afternoons/evenings.

title: Warped polarized lens
body: I bought these for spending time out in the water, specifically searching for polarized glasses that wouldn’t break my heart if they fell overboard. I tried wearing them driving one day and I got a headache. And then I tried them again on a walk with my friend and I felt a little off the entire walk. I had my friend try em on and she was like “something is off with the glasses”. Turns out the lenses are so thin, they are warped, hence the headache. I could have gotten a defective pair. Really cute in theory, but I can’t wear em.

title: Excellent Sunglasses
body: I really love the look and feel of the sunglasses. The frames seem to be very well-made. The fit is fantastic and comfortable, the lenses are clear and the shade is perfect for every day driving

title: best sunglasses ever
body: These are my favorite sunglasses ever, they’re so cute and so comfortable I forget I have them on. Amazing quality for the price, love them so much!!!

title: Vintage look
body: Great glasses for the price. I lost my expensive ones and replaced it with these ones. It’s doing the job. It doesn’t have a cheap look- or isn’t flimsy. Cool lightweight, vintage look.

title: YOU NEED THESE
body: 10/10 recommendI love love love these sunglasses. They are perfect, cute and are exactly what I wanted!

title: Perfect retro pair
body: I was looking for a retro pair of aviators that didn’t have a nose piece like typical aviators do because they always get stuck in my hair! I love these; they’re a bit more round than typical pairs but I love them. They came in a cute box with a velvet pouch & cleaner fabric. They’re also polarized and work so well. I normally get headaches being in the sun all day even with sunglasses and I didn’t when wearing these. If you’re on the fence, get them!!

title: Love Them!
body: These are too cute!! So cute that I ordered a back up pair!!

title: Obsessed.
body: These are great. These pieces are very sturdy. I will be buying all the colors!

title: Love them!
body: I love these sunglasses! They are very stylish and comfortable.

title: Perfect cheap summer time sunglasses.
body: i always get so nervous buying glasses online because i once bought $150 ray bans online and they were too small for my big ole head. 🙃BUT i love these glasses. they are huge and so cheap and look just like any expensive pair of glasses. I have had to buy two pairs because i got drunk and broke my first pair, but still… comes in the mail quick and cheap!

title: Great for price
body: I love these glasses and glasses from this brand. I have bought 3 pairs- they are polarized and stylish and have become my everyday sunglasses

title: A Surprisingly Great Deal...
body: I bought these sunglasses on a whim because I had never really dabbled in these sorts of glasses before and boy, am I glad I did! The frames themselves are light and conform very well to the contour of my face and the lenses are of good quality. Very, very satisfied with this product.

title: Great quality
body: Light and comfortable. Actually I can even go for run with them without problem

title: Jefferey Dahmer Style
body: Ok… hear me out. These glasses are gloriously lightweight, so no nose pain or tightness near your ears. But, they don’t block out much sun. Now for the really honest part, you are absolutely going to look like Jefferey Dahmers mugshot in every insta post! It’s AWFUL!

title: Wonderful Sunglasses!
body: These glasses are well made and stylish. I love them and I plan to buy another pair in a different style. Great quality and very affordable.

title: Yeppp
body: Super cheap price! I know I will break them or lose them so I love the deal. Pretty cute!

title: LIARS.... Just a tint, not Polarized
body: I believe this was the last thing I purchased here on Amazon. Turns out this product is just a tint NOT POLARIZED AS THEY ADVERTISED. They are cute but I felt taken. 😔

title: Quality has changed
body: I ordered these in 2021 and I loved them. They were my favorites. Mine got broken and I ordered a new pair summer 2022. They are listed as the same glasses but they’re different. They’re lighter and feel cheaper. The earpieces are narrow and thin plastic. The ones from 2021 looked and felt expensive. The 2022 ones look like $10 Walmart glasses. They’re fine for the price, but I’m so disappointed in how much the quality changed while being listed as the same glasses.

title: cute
body: very cute style but I have a smaller frame head. So it's very hard to find sunglasses that "fit" and not swallow my entire face. These are more oversized frames but actually tight around the ears.
